detaileddescription.para: Tracks the swapped state of A and B positions.

inbodydescription.para:
Returns a two-site tensor 1--[ LA ]--[ GA ]--[ LC ]-- [ GB ] -- [ LB ]--3 | | 0 2 which in our notation is simply A * B (because A = LA * GA * LC and B = GB * LB), becomes
1--[ 2site_tensor ]--2 | 0

detaileddescription.para: Swap the roles of A and B. Used in the infinite-DMRG stage.

memberdef.argsstring: (const Eigen::Tensor< Scalar, 3 > &twosite_tensor, long chi_lim, std::optional< svd::settings > svd_settings=std::nullopt)
memberdef.name: set_mps

memberdef.argsstring: (const Eigen::Tensor< Scalar, 3 > &MA, const Eigen::Tensor< Scalar, 1 > &LC, const Eigen::Tensor< Scalar, 3 > &MB)
memberdef.name: set_mps

memberdef.argsstring: (const Eigen::Tensor< Scalar, 1 > &LA, const Eigen::Tensor< Scalar, 3 > &MA, const Eigen::Tensor< Scalar, 1 > &LC, const Eigen::Tensor< Scalar, 3 > &MB, const Eigen::Tensor< Scalar, 1 > &LB)
memberdef.name: set_mps
